duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategize, create, and manage social media content for video reels on a single account.
Develop and execute social media strategies to increase engagement, followers, and brand awareness.
Communicate and collaborate with clients to assign tasks and meet content deadlines.
Create high-quality video content with captions, manage content calendars for Instagram, and monitor social media channels for engagement.
Analyze social media data and provide regular reports to clients on performance and progress.
Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and algorithm changes to optimize strategies.
